full_title: I Will Live Again by Arch Enemy
title: I Will Live Again
lyrics:
5 ContributorsI Will Live Again Lyrics[Verse 1]
I don't know
I cannot see
Who we are now
How it used to be
Is it you or is it me
Look in the mirror
We are a fading memory

[Pre-Chorus]
Where are we?
We got lost
In the cold

[Chorus]
I will live again, you'll see
Tomorrow's not scaring me
Far away from yesterday
Just take the pain away

[Verse 2]
Fatal chaos
Hurtful lies
A broken dream
Is all we left behind
Is it you or is it me
Look in the mirror
Just a fading memory
You might also like[Pre-Chorus]
Where are we?
We got lost
In the cold

[Chorus]
I will live again, you'll see
Tomorrow's not scaring me
Far away from yesterday
Just take the pain away

[Instrumental Break]

[Bridge, whispered]
I will live again, you'll see (Live again, and free)
Tomorrow's not scaring me (Not scaring me)
Far away from yesterday (So far away)

[Chorus]
I will live again, you'll see
Tomorrow's not scaring me
Far away from yesterday
Just take the pain away

I will live again
You'll see, you'll seeEmbed
